description: LLM Configuration - Copilot Socket Core (VSCode Extension)
notes: api_key: NOT REQUIRED for Copilot Socket Core (runs on localhost)
endpoint: Copilot Socket Core server URL (default: http://localhost:8765)
model: Supported models - gpt-4o, claude-sonnet-4, gpt-3.5-turbo
temperature: 0.0 = deterministic, 1.0 = creative (0.7 recommended for SQL)
max_tool_rounds: Maximum tool calling iterations (default: 5, max: 200)
Start server: VSCode Command -> 'Copilot Socket: Start Server'
Grant access: VSCode Command -> 'Copilot Socket: Grant Access'
